reviews.title: The builder of this app has a great thing going but....
reviews.comment: Like I said developer in the email I sent you it is customary to remove advertisements once you get paid and I will raise your rating once you do it\'s like you\'re following your customers home!!! Also this is not a wholesale app killer it\'s just kills those in the background and then defragment the memory. But you really don\'t want to download this adware application.
